attributes.action: Protect Britain: Safer Streets, Stronger Borders, Justice First
attributes.additional_details:
Zero tolerance for violent crime & terrorism, stronger policing, tougher sentencing & justice that prioritises victims.
Stronger border security & immigration control. Rigorous vetting of all immigrants to safeguard public safety.
A safer society, where every person who calls the UK home, can live without fear.
Protection for women & children from sexual assault & exploitation, with urgent reforms to policing & safeguarding.
We believe the rights & safety of UK citizens must always come first.
attributes.background:
We believe the people of the UK deserve leadership that prioritises safety, justice & accountability.

Communities live with the daily reality of violent crime & the fear of terrorism. Families deserve to know their children are safe, that public transport is secure & the justice systems works

rejection.details:
We are not clear what specific action you are seeking from the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732628
